item.title: Security Oriented Source Code Audit
item.description: A Security-Oriented Code Audit is an in-depth analysis of an organization’s source code to uncover security vulnerabilities, ensure adherence to coding standards, and mitigate potential risks.

item.title: Trainings
item.description: Security Training is a vital service designed to educate and empower organizations and their employees in various aspects of cybersecurity.
